Package cpsc2150.extendedCheckers.models

Interface ICheckerBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
CheckerBoard, CheckerBoardMem
public interface ICheckerBoard
Interface for representing a checkerboard and its operations. Provides methods for managing the game state, moving pieces, and checking win conditions.
